MajorClaims.MC1: having a part time job during your student time will offer students many clear benefits

Claims.C1: By taking on an extra job, students can partly alleviate some their problematic matters such as working experience, confidence and accommodation
Claims.C2: having experienced in working environment during student time offers a distinct advantage when they apply for jobs after their graduation
Claims.C3: students who take on a part time job are often more confident and independent than other ones
Claims.C4: doing extra jobs helps student with money for their accommodation
Claims.C5: that helps students from being reliant on their families as well as is a well-prepared condition for their independent later life

Premises.P1: It is undoubtedly certain that students can gain their practical experience by getting involved extra jobs
Premises.P2: students who get part time jobs have not only academic knowledge but also hands-on experience
Premises.P3: that seems to be more essential the present shortage of sufficiently practical conditions supplied in universities
Premises.P4: Part-time jobs furnish them with precious chance to practice what they are learning at their universities
Premises.P5: By constant communicating with other colleagues daily in a company environment where their new ideas can be raised without hesitation, then students' confidence could be significantly gained
Premises.P6: working conditions require students the independency in thinking, working, and solving problems, which is greatly helpful when the characteristic is applied to tackle subjects in their universities
Premises.P7: high studying tuition, added with raising accommodation expenses are becoming a huge burden to students
Premises.P8: With the money they earn from extra jobs, which normally is not much, those difficulties could be partially solved
